question: Which online payment service provider has become the official umpire partner of the Indian Premier League (IPL) for 5 years?
explanation: On 12th March 2018, the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has announced its association with Paytm as the Official Umpire Partner of the VIVO Indian Premier League for the next five years. Paytm is also the Title Sponsor of India Cricket.
